headline.main: GOEBBELS REPEATS LONG WAR LOOMS; British Will Not Fall in 'a Few Weeks,' He Says in Second Warning of Two Weeks

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Nov. 20, (U.P.) -- Tropaganda Minister Joseph Goebbels says in an article written for next Saturday's issue of the magazine Reich that the destruction of the British Empire will take more than "a few months."
abstract: he repeats warning in another Reich article
snippet: BERLIN, Nov. 20, (U.P.) -- Tropaganda Minister Joseph Goebbels says in an article written for next Saturday's issue of the magazine Reich that the destruction of the British Empire will take more than "a few months."...
